RAVENS 31, PATRIOTS 30 | pictures

Pats fall to Ravens, now 1-2

(Jim Davis/ Globe Staff)
Last night's last-second loss to the Ravens put the Patriots under .500 for the first time since 2003.

Recap: An official nightmare in Baltimore

There were problems with the replacement officials, but plenty of blame can be placed upon the Patriots players who failed to execute at key points last night. (Globe)

At Roxbury Community College,
allegations of assault go unanswered

The Globe has uncovered details of the US Dept. of Education's probe into the college's potential lapses in reporting campus crime, and a culture of secrecy. (Globe)
  • 5/15: Roxbury college probed for gaps in crime reports

Five new plans to assign Hub students

The proposals for allowing students to attend Boston schools closer to their homes could potentially end four decades of cross-city busing, school officials said. (Globe)
  • 9/3: Back to school, Boston pushes for punctual buses
  • 10/28/11: Menino orders oversight of busing  |  Discuss

Pot perceptions among youths

Voters will soon decide on medical use of marijuana in Mass., but some experts say legalizing it could make teens see the drug as curative and safe. (Boston Globe)
